__e: Spent the entire day trying to find a four-star restaurant with a kids' menu.
Hey, I've got the menu for tonight's dinner with your friends.
Excuse me, beefcake has been on the menu since I started working here.
Sometimes a man just needs a $3.00 combo meal.
I've got a menu here somewhere.
Go back and see what's on the menu these days.
I know, I know. I don't need five menu mock-ups, but I literally love every single font.
I think there's more food on this menu than there is in the kitchen.
You know, what you said about the menu is right.
W-well, we have help, but the menu was my idea.
And one thing I know for sure about you, Boone, it's that you take one thing and give to the chief, like menus, and you take something else that we can actually use to solve this case.
I even ate a restaurant where I didn't understand one word on the menu.
I didn't say, "Order my lunch." So sue me.
I'm just visiting, and, um... this menu does nothing for me.
Oh, yeah? "'Cause it's the room service menu."
I can't believe you remember what we had on our first date.
Who do I have to beg around here for a lunch menu?
